meanings.definition: The position or function of an author.
meanings.sent1: In her authorships, she enjoys creating new worlds and characters.
meanings.sent2: His multiple authorships in the literary world have gained him recognition.
meanings.sent3: The authorships of the writers at the fantasy convention were on full display.
meanings.sent4: Her authorships shone brightly in the realm of science fiction.
meanings.sent5: The authorships of the poets echoed through the halls of the library.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being an author.
meanings.sent1: The authorships of the famous novelist were evident in every page of her book.
meanings.sent2: His authorships were evident in the way he crafted his stories.
meanings.sent3: The authorships of the mystery writer were as mysterious as her plots.
meanings.sent4: Her authorships were like a beacon of creativity in the literary world.
meanings.sent5: The authorships of the playwright were celebrated by theater enthusiasts.
